video_prompt: Pan across a winding river reflecting shifting building lights. Track casual people moving along a curved wooden walkway. Transition across pedestrian bridges with changing light patterns. Ascend past varied skyscrapers with growing green facades and active illuminated windows, emerging from a rising mist. Conclude as the sky transitions through sunrise or sunset hues, with distant lights appearing.
image_prompt: High-angle shot of a serene, utopian futuristic cityscape at dusk/dawn. A winding river reflects warm building lights, lined with glass-domed structures and lush trees. Elegant pedestrian bridges connect towering, green-covered skyscrapers, some with unique architectural features. The hazy distance reveals more buildings under a soft, colorful sky, blending cool and warm tones, showcasing advanced civilization harmoniously integrated with nature.
refined_video_prompt: A camera pans, tracking the flow of a winding river with building lights dynamically shifting in its reflections. People casually move along a curved walkway as the view transitions across pedestrian bridges with light patterns altering. The camera ascends past skyscrapers, their green facades visibly growing, and windows actively illuminating. Mist rises and recedes, revealing structures. The sky transitions through sunrise/sunset hues, with distant lights emerging into view.
